mapper.select: SELECT t5.key FROM `user` t1 LEFT JOIN user_role t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.role_id LEFT JOIN role_menu t4 ON t3.role_id = t4.role_id LEFT JOIN menu t5 ON t4.menu_id = t5.menu_id WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id AS id, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, p.bio, DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS joinDate, CASE WHEN #{loginUserId} IS NULL THEN false ELSE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM follows WHERE follower_id = #{loginUserId} AND following_id = u.user_id ) END AS isFollowing FROM user u LEFT JOIN profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.user_id = ( SELECT user_id FROM article WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND is_del = 1 )

SELECT * FROM user u LEFT JOIN profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.username}, '%')
AND u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.email}, '%')
AND u.is_active = #{param.status}
and u.is_del = 0
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM user u LEFT JOIN profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
